objects.specification: A smooth square floor panel with a neutral-tone matte finish, designed to serve as the base of the exhibition booth. The surface has a subtle texture to prevent slipping and is uniformly colored in a light neutral hue.
A flat vertical panel with a smooth, neutral-tone matte surface. It is a simple wall segment forming part of the booth perimeter, with a clean minimalistic finish to provide a cohesive background.

A curved reception desk with a sleek modern design, featuring a vibrant color finish. The desk has a smooth contoured front-facing curve, an inset countertop for interaction, and a durable matte surface that attracts attention.

A rectangular product display table with a modern minimalist design, featuring a vibrant colored tabletop to showcase products. The tabletop has clean edges, a smooth finish, and sturdy supporting legs, creating a visually appealing display surface.

A streamlined visitor chair with a comfortable seat and backrest, designed in a matching vibrant color. The chair features minimalistic lines, a matte finish, and is ergonomically shaped for short-term seating.

A vertical hanging banner with a lightweight fabric material and bold vibrant graphic design. The banner has top and bottom support rods and features a high-resolution print for decorative branding.

A track-mounted lighting fixture with a cylindrical spotlight head and a neutral color finish. The fixture is designed to cast focused illumination downward, attached to a recessed ceiling track for a clean installation.
